item.title: These Founders Predict AI Will Be a ‘Great Leveler’ That Delivers a ‘Very Hard Job Market’
item.description: Jacqueline Samira of Howdy.com and Isa Watson of Squad share their strategies for embracing artificial intelligence.

item.title: Here’s Why Your Business Should Outsource Accounting
item.description: Emotional ties and trust issues can get in the way of making smart financial decisions.

item.title: Gen-Z Is Becoming the ‘Toolbelt Generation.’ That Could Hurt Your Hiring Chances
item.description: The newest group of entrants to the workforce arrives with a healthy fear of AI, and some radically different beliefs about their career paths.

item.title: WeWork Co-Founder Adam Neumann, Known for Toxic Leadership, Is Still Giving Business Advice
item.description: On a recent a16z podcast, Neumann said he was doing things differently with his latest company, Flow.

item.title: Anthropic Wins Key Ruling on AI in Authors’ Copyright Lawsuit
item.description: AI companies argue that their systems make fair use of copyrighted material to create new, transformative content.
